column5: Hope everyone's okay up there and you camp isn't part of this  http://storage.edmontonsun.com/v1/suns-prod-images/1297580666945_ORIGINAL.jpg?quality=80

Smoke? All is good here other than not being able to breathe. There was a fire close to my lease a few weeks ago but it was doused quickly. It was @ a hydro dam a couple of miles away. Seems a raven landed on one of the transformers got fried, burst into flames and ignighted the forest!!! The smoke has been thick all summer here. Woest I have seen since 1999.  The view here in YK this evening.   Over 1,700 square miles of the NWT has burnt so far this summer.  Fire Map http://www.nwtfire.com/cms/nwt-fire-map
WOW   Look at all that good scrap metal.
